languages.text: "С Леди Теодорой было... непросто. Но своими деяниями перед лицом опасности она заслужила глубочайшее уважение в глазах офицеров... а своей непримиримостью к слабостям — вечное благоговение простых работяг".

"Lady Theodora was... a complicated person. But her actions in the face of danger earned her the officers' deepest respect... and her intolerance of weakness earned her the undying adoration of the common labourers."
languages.original_text: "С Леди Теодорой было... непросто. Но своими деяниями перед лицом опасности она заслужила глубочайшее уважение в глазах офицеров... а своей непримиримостью к слабостям — вечное благоговение простых работяг".

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora was... a complicated person. But her actions in the face of danger earned her the officers' deepest respect... and her intolerance of weakness earned her the undying adoration of the common labourers."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “西奥多拉夫人……是个很复杂的人。不过，她直面危险的品质，让她赢得了军官们最深的敬意。而她对于软弱的绝不宽容，也让她在普通民众之中深受崇拜。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora was... a complicated person. But her actions in the face of danger earned her the officers' deepest respect... and her intolerance of weakness earned her the undying adoration of the common labourers."

traits.locale_text: “西奥多拉夫人……是个很复杂的人。不过，她直面危险的品质，让她赢得了军官们最深的敬意。而她对于软弱的绝不宽容，也让她在普通民众之中深受崇拜。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Dame Théodora était... compliquée. Mais ses réactions face au danger lui ont valu le respect des officiers... et son intolérance envers la faiblesse la vénération des gens du commun. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora was... a complicated person. But her actions in the face of danger earned her the officers' deepest respect... and her intolerance of weakness earned her the undying adoration of the common labourers."

traits.locale_text: « Dame Théodora était... compliquée. Mais ses réactions face au danger lui ont valu le respect des officiers... et son intolérance envers la faiblesse la vénération des gens du commun. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Lady Theodora era... una persona complicada. Pero sus acciones ante el peligro le granjearon el respeto de sus oficiales... y su intolerancia de la debilidad le ganó la adoración eterna de los trabajadores comunes».
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora was... a complicated person. But her actions in the face of danger earned her the officers' deepest respect... and her intolerance of weakness earned her the undying adoration of the common labourers."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Theodora era... una persona complicada. Pero sus acciones ante el peligro le granjearon el respeto de sus oficiales... y su intolerancia de la debilidad le ganó la adoración eterna de los trabajadores comunes».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「レディ・シオドーラは…難解な方でした。しかし、危機に直面したときの行動で士官たちの尊敬を大いに集めたのです…そして寛容さに欠けるという弱みがあることで、平凡な労働者にとっては永遠の憧れの存在なのです」
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora was... a complicated person. But her actions in the face of danger earned her the officers' deepest respect... and her intolerance of weakness earned her the undying adoration of the common labourers."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・シオドーラは…難解な方でした。しかし、危機に直面したときの行動で士官たちの尊敬を大いに集めたのです…そして寛容さに欠けるという弱みがあることで、平凡な労働者にとっては永遠の憧れの存在なのです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Lady Theodora war ... eine komplizierte Person. Doch ihre Taten im Angesicht der Gefahr haben ihr den tiefsten Respekt ihrer Offiziere eingebracht ... Und ihr Abscheu gegenüber jeder Schwäche hat ihr die unsterbliche Bewunderung der einfachen Arbeiter eingebracht."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora was... a complicated person. But her actions in the face of danger earned her the officers' deepest respect... and her intolerance of weakness earned her the undying adoration of the common labourers."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Theodora war ... eine komplizierte Person. Doch ihre Taten im Angesicht der Gefahr haben ihr den tiefsten Respekt ihrer Offiziere eingebracht ... Und ihr Abscheu gegenüber jeder Schwäche hat ihr die unsterbliche Bewunderung der einfachen Arbeiter eingebracht."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora was... a complicated person. But her actions in the face of danger earned her the officers' deepest respect... and her intolerance of weakness earned her the undying adoration of the common labourers."

languages.text: "Leydi Theodora... Karmaşık bir insandı. Ancak tehlike karşısındaki davranışları ile subayların büyük saygısını, zayıflığa tahammülsüzlüğü de sıradan işçilerin sonsuz hayranlığını kazandırmıştı."
languages.original_text: "Lady Theodora was... a complicated person. But her actions in the face of danger earned her the officers' deepest respect... and her intolerance of weakness earned her the undying adoration of the common labourers."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Theodora... Karmaşık bir insandı. Ancak tehlike karşısındaki davranışları ile subayların büyük saygısını, zayıflığa tahammülsüzlüğü de sıradan işçilerin sonsuz hayranlığını kazandırmıştı."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
